data.text: @Jstanthrnobdy @snorman1776 Lol nope.  It’s not misinformation or dangerous.  You are delusional.  Seek help for your Covid hysteria and stupidity.

@Jstanthrnobdy I checked it multiple ways before posting. There is only one other 12 year-old male it could have been & the resident and occurrence state were the same for that one (Georgia).  

As I have kids in this age bracket I can assure you I am conscious of wanting to avoid more grief.

@Jstanthrnobdy @TB12to87 @snorman1776 Thank you so much for doing the hard work to sort through all this data & provide clarity while @CDCgov (whose job it was) was intent on suppressing data & MSM intent on playing on fear of parents, all to increase vax uptake within this group

https://t.co/4J0qH4a5al
@TB12to87 @snorman1776 This is misinformation and dangerous. Whoever you are getting your information from is lying to you.
@Jstanthrnobdy @snorman1776 Kids aren’t at risk from Covid, and I would put money on almost all of the 700+ Covid “deaths” being with Covid, not of Covid.  So yeah.
@snorman1776 "It appears" does not equal "has been proven" but I bet you're counting on your followers to ignore that.
@angrybklynmom @snorman1776 Hospital get mores money and it pays for the funeral if COVID is on the certificate.  Funding has to stop for the numbers to become more accurate.
